overviews.title: me
overviews.en: I have an extensive background in web development within the digital learning sector. I previously held a position as a technical project manager for over 2 years, overseeing the development of online learning platforms. In my current role as a digital learning coordinator, I actively utilize HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to design an online learning platform and create a digital learning material.
overviews.jp: オンライン教育分野での職務/学術バックグラウンドを持つ、フロントエンドエンジニアです。

overviews.title: libft
overviews.en: My own C library replicating frequently used C functions
overviews.jp: C言語の標準関数を複製したCライブラリ

overviews.title: fluentry
overviews.en: An English journaling web application designed specifically to enhance the fluency of English learners. *Currently under development
overviews.jp: 英語学習者の流暢さ向上を目的とした日記アプリ

overviews.title: blog
overviews.en: A statically generated blog from Markdown files.
overviews.jp: Markdownで書く静的生成ブログ

overviews.title: reftion
overviews.en: A web application to generate a reference list for an academic paper based on information on user's Notion database.
overviews.jp: Notionのデータベースの内容を基に学術論文の参考文献リストを出力するWebアプリケーション

overviews.title: folio
overviews.en: Yes, this is what you are seeing now🥰 Thank you for visiting!
overviews.jp: 本ポートフォリオサイト
